title: Update contact email and website in Settings tab

requirements.text: Update the email address displayed in the Settings/About screen from the current value to 'info@mawalkingradio.com'

quotes: update the email listed on the apps setting tab to info@mawalkingradio.com

acceptanceCriteria: The Settings tab displays 'info@mawalkingradio.com' as the contact email
The email address is clickable and opens the default mail client with the correct recipient

requirements.text: Update the website URL displayed in the Settings/About screen from the current value to 'www.mawalkingradio.com'
acceptanceCriteria: The Settings tab displays 'www.mawalkingradio.com' as the website URL
The website URL is clickable and opens the correct website in a new tab

nonGoals: Changing the design or layout of the Settings screen
Adding new contact methods beyond email and website
